(4) You will ensure that intimate touch now existing between yourself and Governor in your command is maintained.

(5) You will submit to Commander-in-Chief copies of your most recent appreciations and plans which are now in operation and will keep him fully informed of any changes in situation by signal if of immediate importance, other- wise by periodical liaison letter.

(6) You will submit location statement show- ing present location of all forces within your command. You will subsequently report major changes in location as they occur.
